share.body:
Hello,

identity information from {alias} has been shared with you. Use the "open attachment" button to view the identity.

Best regards,

{alias}
share.title: Identity information

company.error: Please insert name of your company!
company.label: Company Name

country.error: Please select the company headquarters country
country.label: Company HQ Country

email.error: Please insert a correct email address!
email.label: E-Mail

postalCode.error: Please insert a valid postal code!
postalCode.label: Postal Code

streetAndNumber.error: Please insert a street and a number!
streetAndNumber.label: Street and Number

vat.billing_country_and_vat_missmatch: Provided VAT ID does not match given country code.
vat.error: The VAT ID could not be validated!
vat.eu_billing_vat_not_given: When buying EVEs from outside of Germany and in the European Union a valid VAT ID is required.
vat.label: VAT ID
vat.not_eu_billing_not_possible: Buying EVEs from outside of the European Union is currently not possible.
vat.vat_number_invalid: VAT ID seems to be invalid.

court.error: Please enter the information of the registration authority!
court.label: Register Court

dataStreamSettings.error: Please insert data stream settings files!
dataStreamSettings.label: Data Stream Settings

location.label: Location
location.placeholder: Type in the device location coords.

owner.error: Please insert a valid account address!
owner.label: Owner
owner.placeholder: Type in the owners account address.

serialNumber.label: Serial Number
serialNumber.placeholder: Type in the device Serial Number.

did.delegates-desc: Below you can specify the delegates, who may act on behalf of this identity. This may empower them to edit information, manage sharings or perform transactions.
did.description: With Decentralized Identities (DID) you can identify yourself uniquely, globally and independently of the network or platform. You may also define, who is allowed to make changes to this identity (controller) and who receives authorization to act on behalf of it (delegates). Exporting this document enables you to share all the information with others offline.
did.service-endpoints-desc: Below you can specify service endpoints, to which you want to associate your DID with.

not-permitted.desc: You have no authorization to view this data.

_profile.not-permitted-view: You do not have permission to view this data for the selected Identity.

dev-domain.desc: With this configuration the ending ".evan" is replaced by the given address. With this logic it is possible to use applications on different domains simultaneously for test purposes (e.g.: myapp.test.evan).
dev-domain.title: Applications from test-domain

settings.reload-hint: Please reload the application if you have changed the language settings.

sharing.description: To share your identity information with other partners, first select the appropriate contact and then the information to share. Click on "Share data".
sharing.description-no-contacts: Identity information can be shared with other partners after you have established a secure connection to their evan.network identity. Go to the contact overview and invite your partners via email or identity ID to share your data trustfully.

sharings.desc: Below are all the contacts with which you currently share your Identity information. Click on a profile to adjust the permissions.
sharings.no-data: No Identity data has been shared yet.
sharings.title: Your Identity Data Sharings

type.missing-type: Use the interaction area below to specify your Identity more precisely.
type.missing-type-foreign: No Identity type has yet been selected for this Identity.
type.no-verifications-avaiable: There are currently no verifications available for your Identity type.

verifications.description: Here you can view all your verifications. Verification in the evan.network enables you to be perceived as a trustworthy partner in a digital network.
verifications.error-loading: An error occurred while loading the data. Please try again.

notary.info: Confirm your Identity to be a trusted evan.network member

accountId.desc: Identity for which the notary confirmation should be created.
accountId.title: Identity

issue.file-rename-hint: The uploaded files will be renamed to a uniform naming scheme during the organization verification process.

error.desc: The organization verification could not be issued. Please try again or contact your administrator.
error.title: Error

success.desc: The organization verification was issued successfully.
success.title: Finished

privateFiles.error: You must add at least 1 notarized document to continue.
privateFiles.title: Private, Notary certified files

publicFiles.error: You must add at least 1 notarized document to continue.
publicFiles.title: Public, Notary certified files

requestId.desc: Enter the request ID for which the notary verification is to be completed.
requestId.error: Please enter a correct request ID
requestId.title: Request ID

notary.no-requests: You have not yet requested a Notary Verification. Use the following button to request one.

pin.confirmation-code: Your confirmation code was successfully generated.
pin.desc: Please enter the PIN that was sent to you and generate your confirmation code.
pin.desc-hin: Please pay attention to upper and lower case.
pin.do-not-forget: Please ensure to sign and stamp the document before sending it to the requesting notary.
pin.download: No option to print now? Download as PDF file.
pin.next-step: After successful verification by the notary, your Identity will be verified.
pin.next-step2: You will be informed of this in your mailbox.

pin.desc: The six digits PIN you received within the letter.
pin.error: Please enter the PIN to continue.
pin.error2: The PIN entered was not correct. Please enter the correct PIN.
pin.title: PIN

costs.approve: Yes, I request notarial verification, at the transaction cost of 200 EVE.
costs.description: The transaction fees for notarial verification are 200 EVE. Your wallet will be debited with this amount.
costs.hint: The request for a notarial verification is subject to a fee.
costs.title: Fees

department.error: Please insert the department of the company!
department.label: Department

request.description: Please fill in the formular to request a notary verification of your organisation. This service is subject to a fee.
request.fill-missing: Please fill in all required company information and save it.

1.description: Enter the commercial register number, register court, your address and a contact person.
1.title: Request

2.description: You will receive a PIN by letter. Use this to generate the confirmation document and send it signed to the inquiring notary.
2.title: Authentication

3.description: If the notarial verification is successful, you will be notified. Accept the verification as the last step.
3.title: Accept

mail.body:
I hereby request a Notary Verification with the following information:

  • Identity: {organizationEvanId}
  • Account: {accountId}
  • Commercial Register Number: {organizationRegistration}
  • Organization: {organizationName}
  • Contact: {organizationContact}
  • Address: {organizationStreetAddress}
  • City: {organizationZipCode} {organizationCity} ,{organizationCountry}
mail.title: Request for Notary Verification

request.not-enough-funds: You need at least 200 EVE on your wallet. Your wallet has insufficient funds ({readableFunds} EVE)! Buy EVE
request.only-de: Currently, notary verification is only supported for companies in Germany.

proof.description: To complete the notary verification, you will receive a PIN by letter from a notary to attention of the following person.
proof.title: Please check all information.

request.requested1: You have successfully applied for a Notary Verification for your organization.
request.requested2: Your wallet has been charged 200 EVE.
request.requested3: You will receive a letter from a notary soon.

who.description: As a registered company you can request a notarial verification of your Identity.
who.title: Prerequisites

why.description: The notarial verification confirms that your company has the Identity {accountId}. With this confirmation you can prove yourself to your business partners and verify that transactions, digital twins and smart contracts originate from you.
why.title: Advantages

notary.title: Notary Verification

verification.incorrect: The organization IDs issued to you were not created by the correct instance.
verification.topic-desc: This Identity of the company {companyName} was notarially verified. This certifies the authenticity of the company and the assignment to this account.

verifications.title: All verifications

accept.description: Do you want to continue with buying {amount} EVE?
accept.title: Buy EVE

buy-eve.disclaimer: By entering your IBAN and confirming this payment, you authorize evan GmbH and Stripe, our payment service provider, to send instructions to your bank to debit your account and your bank to debit your account in accordance with these instructions. You are entitled to a refund from your bank in accordance with the terms of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be requested within 8 weeks of the date your account was debited.

errors.charge_failed: A payment cannot be completed because of a failed payment/charge attempt. Your card was NOT debited! Please try again later.
errors.invalid_customer: Your customer data is invalid. Your card was NOT debited! Please try again later.
errors.price_not_okay: An unknown error occurred on the evan.network. Your card was NOT debited! Please try again later.
errors.too_many_accounts: An unknown error occurred regarding your account. Your card was NOT debited! Please contact our customer support.
errors.transaction_failed: Your payment/charge was successful but the transaction on blockchain failed. Your card was debited! Please contact our customer support.
errors.unknown_state: An unknown error occurred during the payment process. Please contact our customer support.
errors.wallet_not_enough_funds: An unknown error on the evan.network. Your card was NOT debited! Please try again later.

amount.error-less: You must by at least 10! ({balance} EVE)
amount.label: Amount of EVE (at least 10)

buy-eve.processing-hint: Processing payment, this may take 3 to 5 minutes
buy-eve.reverse-charge-please-check: Please check for possibly arising tax liabilities in your country from this purchase.
buy-eve.success:
Your order was successfully placed. You will receive an invoice by email. The process is completed as soon as you receive the invoice.

The amount will be credited to your wallet in the next 5 to 10 minutes.

accept.description: Do you want to continue with sending {amount} EVE to {name}?
accept.title: Send EVE

accountId.error: You must insert a valid address.
accountId.label: Identity

amount.error: Please enter a number greater than 0!
amount.error-less: Account balance is to low! ({balance} EVE)
amount.label: Amount of EVE

transactions.credit-running-charge: Charging credit card not completed yet
transactions.description: Only credit recharges are listed below. A complete overview of the transactions can be found here.
transactions.empty: No credit recharges have yet been carried out.
transactions.title: Credit recharged
